revisions.rev:
[[Area code 425]] is a telephone dialing code in [[Washington (U.S. state)|Washington]] for the suburbs north and east of [[Seattle]], particularly the [[Eastside (King County, Washington)|Eastside]], extending east to [[North Bend, Washington|North Bend]], north to [[Everett, Washington|Everett]], and south to [[Maple Valley, Washington|Maple Valley]]. The area code went into service on April 27, 1997, as part of a three-way split of [[area code 206]]. ==Cities in the 425 area code==
*[[Ames Lake, Washington|Ames Lake]] *[[Bellevue, Washington|Bellevue]] *[[Bothell, Washington|Bothell]] *[[Brier, Washington|Brier]] *[[Carnation, Washington|Carnation]] *[[Duvall, Washington|Duvall]] *[[Edmonds, Washington|Edmonds]] *[[Everett, Washington|Everett]] *[[Fall City, Washington|Fall City]] *[[Issaquah, Washington|Issaquah]] *[[Kenmore, Washington|Kenmore]] *[[Kirkland, Washington|Kirkland]] *[[Lake Stevens, Washington|Lake Stevens]] *[[Lynnwood, Washington|Lynnwood]] *[[Maple Valley, Washington|Maple Valley]] *[[Mill Creek, Washington|Mill Creek]] *[[Mountlake Terrace, Washington|Mountlake Terrace]] *[[Mukilteo, Washington|Mukilteo]] *[[Newcastle, Washington|Newcastle]] *[[North Bend, Washington|North Bend]] *[[Redmond, Washington|Redmond]] *[[Renton, Washington|Renton]] *[[Sammamish, Washington|Sammamish]] *[[Snoqualmie, Washington|Snoqualmie]] *[[Snoqualmie Pass, Washington|Snoqualmie Pass]] *[[Woodinville, Washington|Woodinville]]
